text:
Hello,
I created a marketing email for an Abandoned Cart with line items. Plain text properties work well, but the hs_images property is text that contains JSON. Do you have any idea how to parse JSON string in marketing email?
I found a similar question (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/HubL-module-cannot-convert-a-contact-property-to-JSON/td-p/325595>), but the answer is not there ... I know that filters are not supported for email (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters>)
